title: Victory Over the Giants
summary: Joab captures the Ammonite city of Rabbah, and David takes its crown. The chapter also recounts victories over Philistine giants, including descendants of the giant Goliath.

faq.question: What city did Israel capture in this chapter?
faq.answer: Rabbah, the capital of the Ammonites.

faq.question: Who were some of Israel’s enemies in this chapter?
faq.answer: Giants from the Philistine territories, including Goliath’s relatives.
